bibl.title: P. Naqlun Inv. 27+28/88. A Document from an Egyptian Monastery and the Procedure of énachlãfhsiw / retractatio. <anapselaphesis>

series.title: Wydzial Prawa i Administracji Uniwersytetu Warszawskiego

bibl.title: Au-delà des frontières. Mélanges de droit romain offerts à Witold Wolodkiewicz

bibl.note: The document concerns juridical matters, including the procedure of énachlãfhsiw (retractatio). Monastery of Naqlun, 6th century. <anapselaphesis>
bibl.seg: DERDA Tomasz and Jakub URBANIK, P. Naqlun Inv. 27+28/88. A Document from an Egyptian Monastery and the Procedure of énachlãfhsiw / retractatio. <anapselaphesis>
